posts.post_title: WTB: T-206 Charlie O'leary (Hands on Knees) Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 25 (LAST ONE!!)
posts.post_content:

If you've got this, or any ones I have already that may be condition upgrades, please e-mail or PM me!

[quote name="cfc1909" post=803925][url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=13410[/url][/QUOTE]

Ha! Good one, Jim. I can make the rest of the back set PSA 7s and 8s as long as I ignore that back upgrade!
Bump. Not a single response on this request...looking for common backs for this VERY common T-206. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Two Net54ers have come through BIG TIME for me, netting me a Blank Back, Piedmont 42 and an EPDG. Now only one left!  The VERY easy Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 25.  Any one will do!
4 week bump.  SOMEONE has to have this common, no?

i'll check my stack joe and let you know. graded or ungraded?
